name: A Dark Stroll
description:
Walk through the woods and listen to these dudes whisper nonsense. Watch out for sticks, the noise'll get someone snatched by the darkness.

Sound, coding , and dialogue by yours truly

Art and design by @tea_dragon

Made in 72 hours for Minijam: 126 "Lost", with the limitation "Time Is  A Resource," updated a few minutes after the deadline to fix some flickering.
